post.body: lost how. Lost deleted ? 'cause if so, http://is.gd/3bsQ. Lost can't find? 'cause if so, http://is.gd/e4E8
My wife's a Cali girl, and often complains that I stuck her out her on the East Coast. Me, I like the weather.
I was on Car Talk back in the late 90's. My segment was about 20 minutes, but it was NPR so I figure it only counts for 10.
Slide 21 - Is this coming off my 15 minutes?
@RJ0hnson More saliently, I use URLBarExt (http://is.gd/3RB7) and set it to use is.gd. Hmm... just had an interesting idea.
@RJ0hnson I use is.gd, but tr.im seems about the same. They both come out to 10 chars, where "tinyurl.com/" is 12 already.
It worked for me abt 2 weeks ago. Turnaround time's less than a week. I think a couple days for me. I haven't checked back.
Have you seen/tried MrTweet? #MrTweet
and I can say with certainty that there are some people who are essentially taking dictation.
...you seen the way some people take notes now? I'm class of 97 when laptops were just coming in. I went back for my LLM in 05
I completely agree re professionalism issue. Wrt verbatim-ositiy (that's definitely not the right word) of the notes, have...
froma pure copyright perspective it's not completely ridonkulous.
...commercial use, stepping on possible exploitation by the professor/school. I agree it's an offensive case, but...
Fair use? I dunno - taking pretty much the whole of a thing, explicitly seeking the heart of it, not very transformative...
notes. Questions of implied license, etc. (But if you have to go to implied license, it's actually bad for the rational view)
Off to home. How like a winter shall my absence be from all you tweeps who follow me? Okay. Not much. But g'night anyway.
Off to talk to the big boss. Back in a bit, y'all.
Does anyone know a low-effort way (preferably with Paint.Net or Gimp) to turn a photo into a WSJ-style woodcut (ala http://is.gd/e0GI)
I just commented on your blog post, with pointers to http://is.gd/e0je and http://is.gd/e0i1.
heh. I just used "ridonkulous" in a vaguely professional setting.
